note:
Always inquisitive & upbeat I thrive on promoting things, people & innovations I believe in.

An effective public speaker with more than 4,000 group presentations to crowds ranging from thousands to dozens, I love promoting something I truly believe in.

A lifetime of sales has honed my personal & professional effectiveness.

As a baby-boomer fiercely defending my independence I have recently embarked on a discovery of the Crypto/Blockchain space & I'm fast becoming a motivated believer!
